module.p: athair father is a masculine simple common noun.

section.p:
Older pedagogical examples –
Tha mo mhàthair a’ sgrìobhadh litreach gu m’athair a tha air falbh.
My mother is writing a letter to my father who is away. td. 5
Bha an latha brèagha blàth is thug an athair leis Iain agus Anna anns a’ chàr.
The day was lovely and warm and their father took John and Ann in the car. td. 6
